```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(warning = FALSE, message = FALSE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

expense <- read_csv("aoc_01.txt", col_names = "fee1")
```

```{r}
expense %>%
  crossing(fee2 = .$fee1) %>%
  filter(fee1 + fee2 == 2020) %>%
  mutate(product = fee1 * fee2)
```


```{r}
expense %>%
  crossing(fee2 = .$fee1) %>%
  crossing(fee3 = .$fee1) %>%
  filter(fee1 + fee2 + fee3 == 2020) %>%
  mutate(product = fee1 * fee2 * fee3)
```
